App.LoadingProblemText: Unable to fully load the app. Try reloading, or if the problem continues, please remove and reinstall the app. Removing the app will delete your vault. DO NOT REMOVE unless you have a backup.

Settings.DisplayLanguageHint: Change the display language for the app.
Settings.ChooseModeHint: You must save the settings to apply the mode.
Settings.AmountFormatHint: Change the display format for amounts.
Settings.AutoLockTimerHint: Set the idle time in minutes before the wallet locks.
Settings.WalletDescriptionP1: Non-custodial vault in your browser for secure account management.
Settings.WalletDescriptionP2: This vault is free and open-source software.
Settings.AnarchyText: “Unlike the communities traditionally associated with the word 'anarchy', in a crypto-anarchy the government is not temporarily destroyed but permanently forbidden and permanently unnecessary. It's a community where the threat of violence is impotent because violence is impossible, and violence is impossible because its participants cannot be linked to their true names or physical locations.” - Wei Dai 1998
Settings.LogsDescription: Debug and error logs from the app that you can share with the developers.
Settings.RegisterProtocolHandlerDescription: You can register this extension as a handler for different protocols. This action must be done in full window mode; it is not possible in the extension popup view. Click the expander icon at the bottom right, then open "Settings" and "Register Protocol Handler" again.
Settings.RegisterProtocolHandlerDescriptionP1: If you click X on the request or block it, the request will never be displayed again until you manually unblock the extension.
Settings.RegisterProtocolHandlerDescriptionP2: Copy the link manually and open it in a new tab.
Settings.ThirdPartyLicensesDescription: Nostria Signer is an open-source project published under the MIT license. You can view the source code on
Settings.NetworkStatusDescription: Network status is not available in this version.
Settings.NoServerOnline: No servers online for this network.
Settings.ChangePasswordDescription: Change the password you use to unlock your vault.
Settings.PermissionsDescription: Manage the persisted permissions you have authorized for web apps.
Settings.ShowSecretRecoveryPhraseDescription: Do NOT share your secret phrase with anyone!
Settings.ShowSecretRecoveryPhraseDescriptionP1: If someone has your secret recovery phrase, they have full control over your vault.

Wallet.ImportPrivateKeyDescription: Import an existing Nostr private key (nsec or hex) and use signer without creating an HD vault.
Wallet.CreateWalletDescription: This is your private and secret sentence that secures your vault. You must store it safely; if you lose it, you will lose all your assets. Nobody can recover it for you.
Wallet.RecoverWalletDescription: Restore your existing vault with your 12 or 24-word secret recovery phrase.
Wallet.RecoverWalletNote: Note: This is a hot vault. It is advised not to recover important vaults on hot vaults.
Wallet.YourPersonalExtensionWords: Your personal extension words, this is optional.
Wallet.PersonalExtensionWordsTooltip: If you want to increase the security of your wallet, you can enter your personal extension words. This adds two-factor security to your wallet, meaning that you will need both the recovery phrase of 12 words, which you have written down for backup, and the extension word you enter below. Make sure you can easily remember these extension words. If you lose it, then you will not be able to restore your wallet, even if you have a backup of the recovery phrase. Do not overestimate your ability to remember this word.
Wallet.CreatePasswordDescription: You use this to unlock your vault and keep your vault secure. Use a strong password.
Wallet.CreatePasswordMessage: Nobody can recover your password if you forget it.
Wallet.InstallAppNotIOS: By installing the app, you'll get a dedicated icon to launch and a dedicated window on your device.
Wallet.InstallAppIOS: On Apple devices, you must use the 'Share' button and choose the 'Add to Home Screen' action.
Wallet.AllDoneDescription: You can now begin to manage your vault.
Wallet.ProtectYourWalletP1: Your Secret Recovery Phrase controls all of your accounts.
Wallet.ProtectYourWalletP2: Never share your Secret Recovery Phrase with anyone.
Wallet.ProtectYourWalletP3L1: We will never ask for your Secret Recovery Phrase.
Wallet.ProtectYourWalletP3L2: Always keep your Secret Recovery Phrase in a secure and secret place.
Wallet.Disclaimer: The software is provided 'as is', without warranty of any kind. Use at your own discretion.
Wallet.DeleteYourWalletMessage: This will remove the '{{ name }}' vault. Make sure you have a backup of your secret recovery phrase or you might lose your vault forever. Nobody can restore it except you.

Wipe.WipeAllDataAndCacheDescription: This will remove all data, state, and cache from the extension. All local changes that have not been persisted to cloud storage or blockchain will be lost.

Account.KeyOnlyWalletImportOnly: This wallet only supports imported private keys. Use the Import Key tab.
Account.Name: Name
Account.ThisIdentityIsCurrentlyNOTPublic: This identity is currently NOT public
Account.ThisProfileIsCurrentlyNOTPublic: This profile is currently NOT public
Account.ProfileNameHint: The name you want to be identified with.
Account.ProfileEmailHint: The e-mail to contact the identity.
Account.Label: Label
Account.ReceiveNote: Note: this is a hot wallet. We recommend using it for small amounts.
Account.ReceiveAddressCaption: This address can only be used to receive {{ symbol }} on the {{ name }} network.
Account.AmountRequired: Amount is required and must be correctly entered.
Account.AmountTooManyDecimals: The value of the amount cannot have more than 8 decimals.
Account.AmountTooHighValue: The value of the amount must be below 100000000000.
Account.StandardTokensNotice: Notice: The token API does not support decimals in the current release. Values are shown without decimals in this version.
Account.WalletsPersistedStateMessage: Contains your encrypted secret recovery phrase. Do NOT share this with anyone!
Account.SelectAccountsMessage: Choose which accounts to add to your vault
Account.ErrorWhileCreatingAccount: Error while creating account. Critical error, please try again.
Account.FeeInvalid: Fee is required and must be correctly entered.
Account.ClickToFillOutMaximum: Click to fill out maximum (minus fee)
Account.PaymentRequestIsMadeForAnotherNetwork: The payment request is made for another network:
Account.FeeRateTooLow: Fee rate too low, minimum required

Action.SigningAccountMessage: You attest with your selected account to the following content
Action.EncryptContentDescription: You encrypt with your selected account the following content
Action.DecryptContentDescription: You decrypt with your selected account the following content
Action.AttestContentDescription: You attest with your selected account the following content
Action.SuccessfullyLoggedIn: You have successfully logged in. You can now close this window
Action.BlockcoreVaultSetupDescription: You are performing a request for Nostria Vault setup. This action involves you picking the decentralized identifier you want to be the owner of the Nostria Vault instance.

Exchange.PurchaseCryptoDescription: Purchase your first cryptocurrency using traditional payment methods such as Visa, MasterCard, Apple Pay, SWIFT, SEPA, and more.
Exchange.ExchangeCryptoDescription: Exchange your existing cryptocurrency for another cryptocurrency.
Exchange.ExchangeBTCForSTRAX: Exchange BTC for STRAX with Exolix
Exchange.ExchangeSTRAXForBTC: Exchange STRAX for BTC with Exolix
Exchange.ExchangeBTCForSTRAXChangeNOW: Exchange BTC for STRAX with ChangeNOW
Exchange.ExchangeSTRAXForBTCChangeNOW: Exchange STRAX for BTC with ChangeNOW
Exchange.PartnersDescription: Using our links and affiliated partners helps support the continued development of this wallet.

SignVerify.SignatureVerifiedDescription: This means that the message has been verified to be signed by the owner of the specified address/identity.
SignVerify.FailedSignatureVerificationDescription: This means that the message was not signed by the owner of the specified address/identity.
